statements: SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws;
SELECT country, law_title FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT country, law_description FROM citizenship_laws WHERE law_title = 'Citizenship Act';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws ORDER BY law_title DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_laws FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT country, law_title FROM citizenship_laws WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY law_title DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) FROM citizenship_laws GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT law_title, UPPER(law_description) AS uppercase_description FROM citizenship_laws WHERE LENGTH(law_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws WHERE country = 'Canada' AND law_title LIKE '%visa%';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws;
SELECT id, country FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT country, law_description FROM citizenship_laws WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT tracking_id, law_id, compliance_officer FROM compliance_tracking;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT country, law_description FROM citizenship_laws ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT country, law_description, compliance_status FROM citizenship_laws WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, law_compliance_date, compliance_officer FROM compliance_tracking WHERE compliance_officer = 'John Doe';
SELECT country, law_description, law_compliance_date FROM citizenship_laws JOIN compliance_tracking ON citizenship_laws.id = compliance_tracking.law_id;
SELECT * FROM Citizenship Laws;
SELECT country_name, legal_age FROM Citizenship Laws ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT country_name, citizenship_requirements FROM Citizenship Laws WHERE legal_age >= 18;
SELECT law_id, compliance_date FROM Citizenship Regulations ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
SELECT tracking_id, compliance_status FROM Compliance Tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT country_name, legal_age FROM Citizenship Laws WHERE legal_age >= 18 ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT country_name, citizenship_requirements FROM Citizenship Laws WHERE LENGTH(citizenship_requirements) > 100 ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, country_id, compliance_status FROM Compliance Tracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Not Compliant' ORDER BY tracking_id ASC;
SELECT law_id, regulation_details FROM Citizenship Regulations WHERE compliance_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY compliance_date DESC;
SELECT cl.country_name, ct.compliance_status FROM Citizenship Laws cl JOIN Compliance Tracking ct ON cl.legal_age <= 21 AND cl.country_name = 'USA' ORDER BY ct.tracking_id ASC;
SELECT country_name, law_description FROM CitizenshipLaws;
SELECT regulation_text, regulation_date FROM CitizenshipRegulations WHERE citizenship_id = 3;
SELECT authority_name, authority_description FROM RegulatoryAuthorities;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_text, regulation_date FROM CitizenshipRegulations WHERE regulation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tracking_id, compliance_status, compliance_date FROM ComplianceTracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT country_name, law_date FROM CitizenshipLaws;
SELECT regulation_text, regulation_date FROM CitizenshipRegulations ORDER BY regulation_date DESC;
SELECT authority_name, authority_description FROM RegulatoryAuthorities WHERE LENGTH(authority_description) > 100;
SELECT tracking_id, compliance_status FROM ComplianceTracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT country_name, law_description FROM CitizenshipLaws WHERE law_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT name, country FROM Citizens ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM Laws WHERE title LIKE '%regulation%';
SELECT * FROM Regulations WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, violation_description, violation_date FROM Violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Citizens;
SELECT name, country FROM Citizens WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT title, description FROM Laws ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT c.name, r.start_date, r.end_date FROM Citizens c JOIN ComplianceRecords cr ON c.citizen_id = cr.citizen_id JOIN Regulations r ON cr.regulation_id = r.regulation_id;

SELECT v.violation_description, r.start_date FROM Violations v JOIN ComplianceRecords cr ON v.record_id = cr.record_id JOIN Regulations r ON cr.regulation_id = r.regulation_id ORDER BY r.start_date DESC;
